## Statistical Mechanics Entropy
\begin{center}
    Average Behaviour $\rightarrow$ Macroscopic Properties
\end{center}
\pause
Ludwig Boltzman's statistical mechanical entropy
\begin{equation}
    S = k_b\ln(\Omega)
\end{equation}

$\Omega$ is the multiplicity of the macrostate

## Microstates, Macrostates, and Multiplicity
Consider three coin flips
